description: General arena strategies and mechanics for Wrath of the Lich King

Shadow_Sight.name: Shadow Sight
Shadow_Sight.locations: Spawns in 2 specific spots on each map (usually near pillars/tombs).

Dampening.note: Not present in WotLK 3.3.5a. Matches can go indefinitely until draw (45m).

Water_Flush.effect: Pushes players out of spawn pipe.

Dalaran_Sewers.strategy: Control the stairs. Use Boxes for LoS. Use Waterfall to reset combat or drink.

Elevators.effect: Rise to arena level at start.

Pillars.timer: First rise at 0:45. Cycle: Up 25s / Down 20s.

Ring_of_Valor.strategy: Hard switch when pillars drop. Use Flames to LoS casts if desperate.

Blades_Edge_Arena.strategy: Control the Bridge. Knockbacks (Typhoon/Thunderstorm) are king here. If melee, force fight under bridge.

Nagrand_Arena.strategy: Pillar Humping is mandatory. Healers must never cross mid without support.

Ruins_of_Lordaeron.strategy: Kite around the Tomb. Starter room can be used to reset if team pushes too deep.

LoS_Logic.Healers: Always stay near a pillar/box. Never stand in the open.
LoS_Logic.DPS: Pull enemies OUT of LoS of their healer.

Targeting.Switching: Hard switch on defensive cooldowns (Bubble, Ice Block).
Targeting.Focus: Always set Focus on the enemy healer/CC target.
